H0.text: Heat up is the reason that sound reaches our ears because sound makes air particles heat up.

H1.text: Cool down is the action that sound makes air particles do, allowing sound to reach our ears.

H2.text: Slow down is the process by which sound reaches our ears, because sound makes air particles slow down.

H3.text: Vibrate is the action sound takes on air particles, enabling sound to reach our ears.

A4.text: Sound is propagated by progressive longitudinal vibratory disturbances (sound waves).
